ualberta.g12.adventurecreator.test

Class ChoiceTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • junit.framework.Assert
      • junit.framework.TestCase
        • android.test.InstrumentationTestCase
          • android.test.ActivityTestCase
            • android.test.ActivityInstrumentationTestCase2<ChoiceEditActivity>
              • ualberta.g12.adventurecreator.test.ChoiceTest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    junit.framework.Test

    public class ChoiceTest
extends android.test.ActivityInstrumentationTestCase2<ChoiceEditActivity>
    These test cases test that all getters and setters of the Choice class work correctly, because there are no methods other than getters and setters associated with the choice class thats all we test We test if all fields choiceText, linkedToFragmentPos, and isRandom behave correctly

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void testGetChoiceTextAndSetChoiceText()
      Tests to see if we can both set the choice text and also get the choice text from the newly Created Choice To we create a new choice object set the text and then get the text and see if it is the same
      void testLinkedToFragment()
      Tests to see if the getLinkedToFragmentPos and setLinkedToFragmentPos work We can do this by creating a new choice object..then setting and getting the fragmentPos to make sure its the samesies then make sure its the same
      void testSetIsRandomAndGetIsRandom()
      Tests to see if the getisRandom and setisRandom works correctly We do this by creating a new choice then setting and getting true and false to the isRandom
